0x404514D231DB27A0.name: _ENABLE_ALL_SPECIAL_AMMO_FOR_PED
0x404514D231DB27A0.comment:
Enables all special ammo types for the specified weapon on the given ped.
This is the inverse of _DISABLE_ALL_SPECIAL_AMMO_FOR_PED, restoring the pedâ€™s ability to use any special ammo variants available for that weapon.
Restores full access to special ammo categories such as express, high velocity, split point, explosive, etc.
